description:
As a leader in digital financial services, our customer and employee experiences run on data. We depend on the Ally analytics community to fuel these journeys and to help nearly 10,000 leaders and employees make countless data-driven decisions every day.

We're looking for a passionate Senior Data Scientist with great technical skills for our Auto Consumer Asset Management group.

This person will report to the Data Science Manager, with responsibilities of (1) preparing, preprocessing, and validating consumer data for Ally Auto Finance business, (2) utilizing data science techniques to facilitate servicing analytics & asset management strategy, and (3) supporting through-the-cycle predictive analytics for Ally consumer asset management.

The ideal candidate should be passionate about data science and consumer risk analytics for banking & financial services.

If you are a creative and critical thinker, storyteller, learner, and innovator and want to work in an environment focused on using data science and big data tech, keep reading.
